com.stefanbrenner.droplet.model
Interface IDropletContext

All Superinterfaces:
INotificationSupport
All Known Implementing Classes:
DropletContext
public interface IDropletContext
extends INotificationSupport

Interface that encapsulates the droplet context and it's base objects.

Author:
Stefan Brenner
